instruction: Store the Semaglutide pen in the small cooler used for vaccines, with gel packs provided.

attributes.comment: Store the Semaglutide pen in the small cooler used for vaccines, with gel packs provided.

instruction: If mid-day sugars climb above 200, call to add two units of rapid insulin before lunch.

attributes.comment: If mid-day sugars climb above 200, call to add two units of rapid insulin before lunch.

instruction: Set a six-week phone review after faxing the lab slip today.

attributes.narrative: Set a six-week phone review after faxing the lab slip today.
